STORY1.TITLE: Early Period
STORY1.HISTORY1: - 1990 Completed construction of POSCO stainless steel pipe plant

STORY3.TITLE: Recent Period

SUMMARY.TITLE: The leader of stainless pipes, UST

FEATURE1.TITLE: Various sizes
FEATURE1.DESCRIPTION: UST manufactures pipes in every size from 1" to 54"

FEATURE2.TITLE: Outstanding Quality
FEATURE2.DESCRIPTION: UST manufactures outstanding pipes by combining 40 years of know-how and installation experience with new facilities and machines.

FEATURE3.TITLE: Excellent Packing
FEATURE3.DESCRIPTION: UST provides perfect packages for the best pipes with its automatic packing machine.

INQUIRY.TEXT: Experience top-quality pipes and prompt delivery from our branches across different regions!

HEADER.TITLE: Pride in Best Quality UST
HEADER.CONTENT: UST is available for every pipe size. We have received various forms of certification to manufacture high-level stainless pipes. We provide perfectly packed pipes with an automatic wrapping machine.

PRODUCT2.NAME: Large diameter welded stainless steel pipes

PRODUCT4.NAME: Stainless steel pipes for boilers and heat exchangers

CATEGORY2.NAME: KS Standard
CATEGORY2.DESCRIPTION: Certificate issued by Korean Standards Association

CATEGORY4.NAME: ISO Standard
CATEGORY4.DESCRIPTION: Certificate issued by International Organization for Standardization.

CATEGORY5.NAME: Shipyard Classification Standard
CATEGORY5.DESCRIPTION: Certificate issued for materials used in vessel manufacturing.

SYSTEM1.NAME: 16" Tube Mill Machine
SYSTEM1.DESCRIPTION: A tube mill produces the greatest size, which improves productivity and quality, replacing the roll bender size.
SYSTEM1.STRENGTH: Producing uniform products through a continuous rolling system.

SYSTEM2.NAME: In-line Calibrator
SYSTEM2.DESCRIPTION: It is able to rectify roundness and straightness at a time in tube mill line after in-line heat treatment. It is the most advanced equipment available to rectify roundness an outside diameter within ±0.1~0.2%.
SYSTEM2.STRENGTH: Shortened correction time, unique applications, simplified factory lay-out, reduced costs

SYSTEM3.NAME: Roll bender
SYSTEM3.DESCRIPTION: A machine that manufactures large-diameter stainless steel pipes including both external and internal welding processes.

SYSTEM4.NAME: In-line heating system
SYSTEM4.DESCRIPTION: It makes pipes complete heat treatment at a time in tube mills. We can produce from 10A to 400A with this heating system.

SYSTEM5.NAME: Automatic packing machine
SYSTEM5.DESCRIPTION: It can quickly pack any size of pipe and prevents defilement.
SYSTEM5.STRENGTH: Protects pipes from defilement, can be stored for a long period of time, increases wrapping productivity.

SECTION1.TITLE: R&D
SECTION1.SUBTITLE: UST Membrane
SECTION1.DESCRIPTION: Newest secondary battery market requires quick charging, high capacity, and heat stability for battery cells to be used in electric cars, energy storage, etc.

SECTION2.TITLE: Secondary cell membrane manufacturing
SECTION2.SUBTITLE: Hybrid method
SECTION2.FEATURE1: The separator membrane also requires special property, in accordance to changes in market conditions. UST combines the advantages of both dry and wet processes for its hybrid membrane manufacturing.

FEATURE2.TITLE: UST Hybrid Membrane is EXCELLENT.
FEATURE2.CONTENT: In the way that we combine the advantages of two different processes, the hybrid membrane provides expansion of pores through biaxial stretching which fulfills the requirements of the secondary battery market.

RESEARCH2.TITLE: Business Vision & Plan

SECTION1.TITLE: Business Vision & Plan
SECTION1.SUBTITLE: Seperator for electric vehicles
SECTION1.CONTENT1: The separator of electric vehicles requires high output, high capacity, low cost, and high temperature stability.

CONTENT2.ITEM1: High output at hight pore size
CONTENT2.ITEM3: Low cost of production with low prices

SECTION1.CONTENT3: The electric car market, which entered its fully-fledged growth phase in 2016, is expected to grow at a CAGR of over 25% over the next 10 years and to double by 2025. The electric vehicle battery market and separator market will expand at the same rate.

RESEARCH2.SECTION2: The hybrid membrane will grow to be one of the best products to rival competitors’ products in the rapidly growing electrolyte separator market.
